CustomField.formula: OR( AND(RecordType.Name = 'Expense', Requested_Amount__c != Approved_Amount__c), AND(RecordType.Name = 'Labor', Requested_Salary__c != Approved_Salary__c), AND(RecordType.Name = 'Labor', Requested_Benefits__c != Approved_Benefits__c) )
CustomField.label: Approved Not Equal To Requested Amount
